info.title: Website Engine
info.description: Class responsible for starting and pausing the website engine.

method.name: start
method.description: Starts debugger, session and user preferences.

method.name: restart
method.description: Restarts the engine. Shutdown and then start again.

method.name: shutdown
method.description: Sets in suspension (with the user's log out or switch account) the system platform.

method.name: getVar
method.description:
Get a variable from the request. It uses the HTTPRequest to get the variable.
This is based on the user request and supports GET, POST and COOKIES. It works independent and the user doesn't know (doesn't have to know) where the variable comes from.
method.returndescription: The variable value or NULL if the variable doesn't exist in the requested scope.

method.name: isPost
method.description: Checks if it is a POST request. It serves not to check implicit with the HTTPRequest.

parameter.name: $includePUT
parameter.description: Set to include check for PUT request method. It is FALSE by default.

method.returndescription: True if it is a POST (or a PUT, depending on the first parameter) request, false otherwise.

method.name: requestMethod
method.description: Checks if the HTTPRequest request method is the same as the variable given.
method.returndescription: True if the variable has the same value, false otherwise.
